an5.198:1.1: “Mendicants, speech that has five factors is well spoken, not poorly spoken. It’s blameless and is not criticized by sensible people.
an5.198:1.3: It is speech that is timely, true, gentle, beneficial, and loving.
an5.198:1.4: Speech with these five factors is well spoken, not poorly spoken. It’s blameless and is not criticized by sensible people.”
